abstract: General Electric chairman Jeffrey Immelt says his company is eager to gain an ownership stake in Atomic Energy of Canada, and warns there is little future for stand-alone vendors of nuclear reactors.
lead_paragraph: General Electric chairman Jeffrey Immelt says his company is eager to gain an ownership stake in Atomic Energy of Canada, and warns there is little future for stand-alone vendors of nuclear reactors.

headline.main: G.E. Eyes Stake in Canada’s Atomic Energy
